thread.section_title: Spex4Less Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.spex4less.com | 6 of 139
thread.title: kate santos

author: kate santos
title: kate santos
text:
I was very wary about ordering glasses online. I came across this company when looking for a pair of sunglasses, the price was in my budget so i thought i would try them, and i was very pleased with the results and the service that i received.
it does help when ordering online to know the style frame and colour which suits you best, i would order more glasses off them but i found the ones that suit me their rectangle purple range to be limited, but if they get a bigger range i will certainly consider them next year for new glasses.
